channel.title: Market potential on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Market potential on FinanClub

item.title: QS
item.description: score:-8 Chances: Volkswagen’s interest in adapting the solid-state battery technology from France’s Blue Solutions could indicate potential for QuantumScape to also explore alternate partnerships and expand its reach in the industry. QuantumScape’s efforts to address customer hesitancy regarding EV batteries could position it to capitalize on the growing electric vehicle market.

item.title: TGTX
item.description: score:343 Chances: TG Therapeutics, Inc. has entered into an agreement to acquire a worldwide license to Precision BioSciences, Inc.’s Azercabtagene Zapreleucel (azer-cel), an allogeneic CD19 CAR T cell therapy program for autoimmune diseases. The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 127.
